metadata.name: TravelPlanningTopology
metadata.description: AMQP 1.0 messaging topology for AI-powered travel planning system with proposal-refinement pattern
metadata.author: Travel Platform Team

travel.requests.description: Initial travel planning requests from customers

air.travel.description: Flight search requests for air travel agent

air.refine.description: Refinement requests for air travel agent

train.travel.description: Train search requests for train travel agent

train.refine.description: Refinement requests for train travel agent

road.travel.description: Road travel requests for road travel agent

road.refine.description: Refinement requests for road travel agent

accommodations.description: Accommodation search requests for accommodation agent

rental.cars.description: Rental car requests for rental car agent

rentalcar.refine.description: Refinement requests for rental car agent

travel.events.description: Ordered sequence of travel planning lifecycle events

TravelPlannerService.description: Central travel planning coordinator that orchestrates expert agents

AirTravelAgent.description: Expert agent specializing in flight searches and airline coordination

TrainTravelAgent.description: Expert agent specializing in rail travel options and schedules

RoadTravelAgent.description: Expert agent specializing in bus routes and road travel options

AccommodationAgent.description: Expert agent specializing in hotels, vacation rentals, and lodging

RentalCarAgent.description: Expert agent specializing in vehicle rentals and local transportation

TravelAnalyticsService.description: Analytics service that processes travel events for business intelligence

NotificationService.description: Service responsible for sending travel-related notifications to customers

links.description: Log all proposals to travel event stream
links.transformationScript: { type: 'proposal-received', tripId: message.TripId, agentType: message.AgentType, timestamp: Date.now() }

links.description: Send confirmation notification when travel request is received

development.description: Local development environment for travel planning system

staging.description: Staging environment with realistic production-like travel setup

production.description: Production environment with high availability and geographic distribution for travel platform

Travel.Planning.TravelRequestsProducer.description: AMQP producer endpoint for travel planning requests

Travel.Planning.TravelRequestsConsumer.description: AMQP consumer endpoint for travel planning requests

Travel.Planning.TravelProposalsProducer.description: AMQP producer endpoint for travel proposals from expert agents

Travel.Planning.TravelProposalsConsumer.description: AMQP consumer endpoint for travel proposals

Travel.Planning.AirTravelConsumer.description: AMQP consumer endpoint for air travel agent requests

Travel.Planning.TrainTravelConsumer.description: AMQP consumer endpoint for train travel agent requests

Travel.Planning.RoadTravelConsumer.description: AMQP consumer endpoint for road travel agent requests

Travel.Planning.AccommodationsProducer.description: AMQP producer endpoint for accommodation agent requests

Travel.Planning.AccommodationsConsumer.description: AMQP consumer endpoint for accommodation agent requests

Travel.Planning.RentalCarsProducer.description: AMQP producer endpoint for rental car agent requests

Travel.Planning.RentalCarsConsumer.description: AMQP consumer endpoint for rental car agent requests

Travel.Planning.RefinementProducer.description: AMQP producer endpoint for refinement requests to agents

Travel.Planning.TravelEventsProducer.description: AMQP producer endpoint for travel lifecycle events

Travel.Planning.TravelEventsConsumer.description: AMQP consumer endpoint for travel lifecycle events

Travel.Planning.NotificationsProducer.description: AMQP producer endpoint for travel notifications

Travel.Planning.NotificationsSubscriber.description: AMQP subscriber endpoint for travel notifications

com.contoso.travel.TravelRequests.description: Interface for travel planning requests (both producer and consumer)

com.contoso.travel.TravelProposals.description: Interface for travel proposals (both producer and consumer)

com.contoso.travel.TravelProposal.description: Travel option proposal from expert agents

source.description: Source agent that created the proposal

source.description: Source service requesting road travel search

com.contoso.travel.RentalCars.description: Interface for rental car requests (both producer and consumer)

source.description: Source service requesting rental car search

id.description: Unique identifier for this refinement request

schema.title: TravelRequestData
schema.description: Data schema for travel planning request

schema.title: TravelProposalData
schema.description: Data schema for travel proposal from expert agents

tripId.description: Reference to the original trip request

agentType.description: Type of expert agent providing the proposal

agentId.description: Unique identifier of the agent instance

estimatedCost.description: Best estimated cost from the options

confidence.description: Agent confidence level in the proposal (0.0-1.0)

schema.title: RefinementRequestData
schema.description: Data schema for proposal refinement request

tripId.description: Reference to the original trip request

originalProposalId.description: Reference to the original proposal being refined

priority.description: Priority level for processing this refinement

schema.title: TravelEventData
schema.description: Data schema for travel planning lifecycle events

agentId.description: Unique identifier of the agent instance

parentEventId.description: Reference to parent event in the workflow

schema.title: TravelNotificationData
schema.description: Data schema for travel notification messages

ProposalRefinement.name: ProposalRefinement
ProposalRefinement.description: Request → Propose → [Refine → Propose] *n pattern for iterative improvement

phases.description: Initial request sent to expert agents
Expert agents respond with initial proposals
Coordinator requests refinements based on analysis
Expert agents respond with refined proposals
phases.condition: Can repeat REFINE → PROPOSE cycle multiple times
